short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Apply a myopic defocus effect on any website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Applies a Myopic Defocus effect on any website. This makes the screen look on the retina naturally as if it was at a greater distance. This effect is based on the physical refractive properties of the human eye. This effect is being researched for its myopia prevention properties.

The source code is available on Github.
